item.description: 问题1：Metrics Server部署失败 Events: Type Reason Age From Message ---- ------ ---- ---- ------- Normal Scheduled 14m default-scheduler Successfully assigned kube-system/metrics-server-7898cc74cb-jdwps to master Normal Pulling 14m kubelet Pulling image "k8s.gcr.io/metrics-server/metrics-server:v0.5.2" Normal Pulled 13m kubelet Successfully pulled image "k8s.gcr.io/metrics-server/metrics-server:v0.5.2" in 16.557781304s Normal Created 13m kubelet Created container metrics-server Normal Started 13m kubelet Started container metrics-server Warning Unhealthy 3m54s (x57 over 13m) kubelet Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500 修改components.yaml, 添加--kubelet-insecure-tls
